text:
Hi! We've been digging up SO MUCH stone lately.

But now I need your help storing all of this stone.

I already asked Frank to put a shed up here but he says the wind would just blow it off.

I heard from Mr Jones that you helped him store a lot of his coal using bags or something?

Could you help me out with that as well?
uponCompletion: Oh, yes, sure! Coal and stone are about the same size!
